title: CryptopreneurBrainboss
author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
content: Quote An actress, Oluwadarasimi Omoseyin, who was earlier arrested by the Independent Corrupt Practices Commission, ICPC, is now being investigated by the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, EFCC.Operatives of the Lagos zonal office of the EFCC commenced an investigation of Omoseyin, a cosmetologist, for allegedly tampering with the new naira notes.The EFCC on Friday said the offence was contrary to Section 21 (5) of the Central Bank of Nigeria Act, 2007. The ICPC nabbed the suspect on Wednesday along Awolowo Road, Ikoyi, Lagos, following an intelligence report. The 31-year-old was arrested following the sharing of an online video of her spraying and stepping on the new naira notes at a party.In the said video, the actress was reportedly seen flaunting wads of the newly redesigned naira notes. She was subsequently handed over to the EFCC on Thursday for further investigations. “Items recovered from her at the point of arrest include a Range Rover and iPhone mobile devices. The suspect will be charged to court once investigations have been concluded,” the EFCC said.Source: https://dailypost.ng/2023/02/03/actress-paraded-by-efcc-for-spraying-new-naira-notes/Wetin una get to talk about this new movement, has the government actually started punishing anybody found to be guilty of abusing the new notes or this is just another personal attack by the government and this actress was a victim. If truely the government wan tackle the abuse of the Naira, how una think say dem go proceed or wetin dem dun start to dey do dey okay by you. Okay what about the market traders, wetin dem go do to stop them abusing and mishandling the new Naira note.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Nigeria problem be say some people dey above the law,which dey mess up the Judiciary system. Nigeria culture na to spray money for party and all these politicians too dey do the same,because we too like show off. For this actress wet dem catch so and dey carry her go court,she too do self,wetin she think say she be wey only she just dey spray herself money come dey match,e show say she no value the cash maybe because she get too much. I see reason to the arrest because no be even occasion she dey do am,na just to show off. If she get strong back up,then the Mata na small thing. For now I no think say e go easy to stop mishandling of the naria because market women no too go school and fit no know another way to handle the money pass their Squeezing pattern. High level of corruption dey make laws no dey effective for the country because na only the poor,law enforcement agencies get power to oppress. The only way out is cashless policy.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: I Dey of the believe that the spraying of the naira note no good at all, na disrespect to the country and also damages the naira Note.But also thinking of it, if the government themselves has chosen to tackle it then they should do so unbiased, so many politicians and men in power they abuse the naira note in occasion. Also the government has lots of situations they should channel this energy for and not spraying of notes.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Shame dey catch me for our government agencies, efcc nor know their work. Spraying of naira notes don turn federal crime? This na case way reach to seize properties put? Police nor fit give her warning make e end there or make her do video to apologize for her actions and sensitize her followers make them no make the same mistake. Why them come dey embarrass the girl publicly like this, e dey sad because when big man go do am nobody go talk but when the youth do am na federal crime worthy of attention. Hypocrisy! Abeg I want make them spray me for my wedding even if na btc you won send still dance small and spray me

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Normally them really need questions am because this new note them still they fine am to use buy market and sustain for family she now get am surplus to even they spray am for road, the story never clear well, make she explain how she carry get am plenty.And nah because she no never get enough connection if not then for no carry the case reach where them carry am reach like that, to come be where them they talk about court.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: SatoPrincess on February 04, 2023, 09:02:12 PMShame dey catch me for our government agencies, efcc nor know their work. Spraying of naira notes don turn federal crime? This na case way reach to seize properties put? Police nor fit give her warning make e end there or make her do video to apologize for her actions and sensitize her followers make them no make the same mistake. Why them come dey embarrass the girl publicly like this, e dey sad because when big man go do am nobody go talk but when the youth do am na federal crime worthy of attention. Hypocrisy! Abeg I want make them spray me for my wedding even if na btc you won send still dance small and spray me Well I expected nothing less from feminist point of view so at that you are right in your own way for putting up something like this in defence of the crime committed by the actress, But the point I will like you to note is as follows. *the new CBN policy stated that an individual is limited to 20k withdrawal a day which also represent our daily spending limit and the Actress flaunted wards of hundreds of thousands of the naira note which is already a violation of the Nigeria currency protection policy which has been in existence even before thos new cashless policy. * Her sources of the naira notes must be investigated because they a money laundering offences. * This is not only happening with the actress but to every other financial crime in whatever ways, Efcc has arrested a lot of money sellers in my location, because there have taken advantage of the panic in the financial sector to exploit Nigerians.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Merit.s on February 04, 2023, 08:37:54 PMIf she get strong back up,then the Mata na small thing. For now I no think say e go easy to stop mishandling of the naria because market women no too go school and fit no know another way to handle the money pass their Squeezing pattern. High level of corruption dey make laws no dey effective for the country because na only the poor,law enforcement agencies get power to oppress. The only way out is cashless policy.Wait no be party she spray the money self? I never follow up the news. I just see am say make I update the community hear our views for this matter. Maybe dem wan use this actress as an example so others go know say dem no dey joke. As for the cashless policy, e no go work for market women oh. Only you talk say dey no dey enlighten so how dem wan take dey do transfer and other online stuffs. I just dey pity dem as yahoo boys go use then shine with fake transactions them. Quote from: BIT-BENDER on February 04, 2023, 08:59:47 PMBut also thinking of it, if the government themselves has chosen to tackle it then they should do so unbiased, so many politicians and men in power they abuse the naira note in occasion. Also the government has lots of situations they should channel this energy for and not spraying of notes.Na misplaced priority, no be away wey men dey spray dollars for clubs, concert etc. Spraying of money na the way wey Nigerian dey use show love to the celebrate. E no go make sense at all if them commot am. E fit ever they make parties now borrowing. The doings wey dey for spraying na him dey make some people self dey go all this occasions. Abeg oh make them wait make we make the money then spray our own before them abolish am.
